DOC.brief_summary: This Phase II , open-label , non-randomized study patient locally advance metastatic breast cancer . Each cycle 4 week length . Patients receive Abraxane weekly 3 week . Patients receive Abraxane week 4 ( rest week ) . Nexavar give continuously . Patients radiologically evaluate every 8 week response . Patients continue receive study treatment disease progression unacceptable toxicity .
